forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low around 10C. Winds ESE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Then remaining cloudy. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. High near 10C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High near 50F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. Low 41F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 39F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 41F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 39F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime after midnight. Low 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
